alert.note: Alert for Central Highlands; Eastern San Miguel County; Far Northeast Highlands; Harding County; Northeast Highlands; Union County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 09 at 9:11PM MST until March 11 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THURSDAY TO 5 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 4 inches except up to 7 inches near Raton. * WHERE...Central Highlands, Eastern San Miguel County, Far Northeast Highlands, Northeast Highlands, Harding County, and Union County. * WHEN...From 3 PM Thursday to 5 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Low temperatures mostly in the teens Thursday night with wind chill readings around 0 degrees.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, dial 511 or 1.800.432.4269, or visit http://nmroads.com.

area.areaDesc: Central Highlands; Eastern San Miguel County; Far Northeast Highlands; Harding County; Northeast Highlands; Union County
